verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* Jerusalem \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w preach|strong="H5197"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* sanctuaries. \w Prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w tell|strong="H8085"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* draw \w My|strong="H8085"\w* sword \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* sheath \w and|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w off|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* cut \w off|strong="H7200"\w* \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* righteous \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked, \w My|strong="H3605"\w* sword \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* unsheathed \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* south \w to|strong="H3068"\w* north.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* all flesh \w will|strong="H3808"\w* know \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w*, \w the|strong="H3069"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H3808"\w* taken \w My|strong="H3808"\w* sword \w from|strong="H3808"\w* \w its|strong="H3808"\w* sheath, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* return \w it|strong="H1931"\w* again.’

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H1961"\w*, son \w of|strong="H3068"\w* man, groan! Groan \w before|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* eyes \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* broken heart \w and|strong="H3068"\w* bitter \w grief|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* ask, ‘Why \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* groaning?’ \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w Because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* news \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* coming. \w Every|strong="H7760"\w* heart \w will|strong="H3478"\w* melt, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H7760"\w* hand \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H3478"\w* limp. \w Every|strong="H7760"\w* spirit \w will|strong="H3478"\w* faint, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H7760"\w* knee \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w turn|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* water.’ Yes, \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* coming \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w surely|strong="H1121"\w* happen, declares \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Lord \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w Again|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* word \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, saying,

“Son \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w*, prophesy \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w what|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H6662"\w* \w says|strong="H3282"\w*: ‘\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, sharpened \w and|strong="H2719"\w* polished—

\w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* sharpened \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* slaughter, polished \w to|strong="H7725"\w* flash \w like|strong="H3318"\w* lightning! \w Should|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* scepter \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* son? \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* despises \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w such|strong="H3808"\w* stick.

\w The|strong="H5869"\w* sword \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w appointed|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* polished, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* grasped \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* hand. \w It|strong="H5869"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* sharpened \w and|strong="H1121"\w* polished, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* placed \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5869"\w* slayer.

Cry \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* wail, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* son \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* wielded \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w*; \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Israel! \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* tossed \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w*; \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w strike|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* thigh.

\w Surely|strong="H1961"\w* testing \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*! \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w even|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* scepter, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sword despises, \w does|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w continue|strong="H1961"\w*?’ declares \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*.

‘\w So|strong="H3541"\w* \w then|strong="H1571"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* strike \w your|strong="H1571"\w* hands \w together|strong="H1571"\w*. Let \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* strike two \w times|strong="H1571"\w*, \w even|strong="H1571"\w* three. \w It|strong="H2719"\w* \w is|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* slays, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* great slaughter closing \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H2719"\w* \w every|strong="H1121"\w* \w side|strong="H3541"\w*!

\w So|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* hearts \w may|strong="H1961"\w* melt \w and|strong="H1121"\w* many \w may|strong="H1961"\w* stumble, \w I|strong="H3988"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w appointed|strong="H1121"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* gates \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H1300"\w* \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*. Yes, \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* ready \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w flash|strong="H1300"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w lightning|strong="H1300"\w*; \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* drawn \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*.

Slash \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* right; \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* blade \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w left|strong="H5414"\w*—wherever \w your|strong="H5414"\w* blade \w is|strong="H1931"\w* directed.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w too|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w strike|strong="H5606"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* hands \w together|strong="H2199"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* satisfy \w My|strong="H3605"\w* wrath.’ \w I|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H1961"\w* spoken.”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* word \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, saying,

“\w Now|strong="H1419"\w* \w you|strong="H5221"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, mark \w out|strong="H1419"\w* \w two|strong="H5221"\w* roads \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* king \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H5221"\w*, both starting \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* land. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* signpost where \w the|strong="H5221"\w* road \w branches|strong="H3709"\w* off \w to|strong="H1121"\w* each \w city|strong="H1931"\w*.

Mark \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* road \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* come \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Rabbah \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Ammonites, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* another \w against|strong="H5921"\w* Judah \w into|strong="H5921"\w* fortified \w Jerusalem|strong="H4616"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Babylon stands \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fork \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* road, \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* junction \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* two roads, \w to|strong="H6440"\w* seek \w an|strong="H7760"\w* omen: \w He|strong="H6440"\w* shakes \w the|strong="H6440"\w* arrows, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* consults \w the|strong="H6440"\w* idols, \w he|strong="H6440"\w* examines \w the|strong="H6440"\w* liver.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* appears \w the|strong="H5221"\w* portent \w for|strong="H3068"\w* Jerusalem, where \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w set|strong="H5117"\w* up battering rams, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* call \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H5221"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w lift|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* battle cry, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* direct \w the|strong="H5221"\w* battering rams \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* gates, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* build \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ramp, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* erect \w a|strong="H3068"\w* siege wall.

\w It|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* seem \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* false omen \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* eyes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* sworn allegiance \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H1961"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* draw attention \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* guilt \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* captive.

Therefore \w this|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w what|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* Lord \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* says: ‘\w Because|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w drawn|strong="H3318"\w* \w attention|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* guilt, exposing \w your|strong="H7760"\w* transgressions, \w so|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* sins \w are|strong="H1121"\w* revealed \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H1254"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w deeds|strong="H1870"\w*—\w because|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* remembrance—\w you|strong="H7760"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w taken|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H7760"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* profane \w and|strong="H1121"\w* wicked prince \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel, \w the|strong="H7760"\w* day \w has|strong="H3063"\w* \w come|strong="H3063"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* final punishment.’

\w This|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w what|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* Lord \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* says: ‘Remove \w the|strong="H7200"\w* turban, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w take|strong="H5975"\w* \w off|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* crown. \w Things|strong="H8147"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w remain|strong="H5975"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w*: Exalt \w the|strong="H7200"\w* lowly \w and|strong="H4428"\w* bring low \w the|strong="H7200"\w* exalted.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* ruin, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ruin, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ruin! \w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w restored|strong="H1129"\w* \w until|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* arrival \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* whom \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w belongs|strong="H1961"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* whom \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w assigned|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* judgment.’

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* prophesy, son \w of|strong="H5869"\w* man, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* declare \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w what|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* Lord \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* says concerning \w the|strong="H2142"\w* Ammonites \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H2142"\w* contempt: ‘\w A|strong="H3068"\w* sword! \w A|strong="H3068"\w* sword \w is|strong="H1931"\w* drawn \w for|strong="H5869"\w* slaughter, polished \w to|strong="H1961"\w* consume, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* flash \w like|strong="H1961"\w* lightning—

\w while|strong="H3541"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* offer false \w visions|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* lying divinations \w about|strong="H3541"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*—\w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w be|strong="H8610"\w* placed \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* necks \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wicked \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H6588"\w* slain, \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* day \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w come|strong="H2142"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* time \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* final \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w*.

Return \w the|strong="H3117"\w* sword \w to|strong="H3478"\w* its sheath! \w In|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* place where \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* created, \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* land \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3478"\w* origin, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* judge \w you|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* pour \w out|strong="H5493"\w* \w My|strong="H5493"\w* anger upon \w you|strong="H3808"\w*; \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* breathe \w the|strong="H3069"\w* fire \w of|strong="H3069"\w* \w My|strong="H5493"\w* fury \w against|strong="H2063"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*; \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* hand \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w over|strong="H3541"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* brutal men, skilled \w in|strong="H5493"\w* destruction.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* fuel \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* fire. \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* blood \w will|strong="H1961"\w* stain \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* land. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* remembered, \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H1961"\w* spoken.’”
